thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 18 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bwx Technologies Announces Pricing Of Senior Notes Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bwx Technologies Announces Pricing Of Senior Notes Offering
text:
May 18 (Reuters) - BWX Technologies Inc:
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES INC - PRICED ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFERING OF $400.0 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 5.375% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES INC - PRICED ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFERING OF $400.0 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 5.375% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES INC - IN CONNECTION WITH NOTES OFFERING, BWXT INTENDS TO ENTER INTO AN $800.0 MILLION SENIOR SECURED CREDIT AGREEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
